name: Classic Slackline - 50 Ft.
short_description: WHY SLACKLINING: Slackling has become a popular trend and recognized sport for kids 6Y+, as well as for adults, over the last 10 years. Many enjoy the challenge and commit it to practicing and improving with patience and focus to walk the line!
BALANCE AND CORE STRENGTH: Many athletes and health conscious individuals know that working on their balance and core strength is important.

EASY SET UP: Setting up a slackline is fairly easy once you learn how to use a ratchet. The setup height is calculated by estimating the knee height for shortest person slacklining, i.e. 20". Attach the ratchet at 20" on both trees. So if a person loses their balance, they have only a small step down to the ground.

TEACHING LINE INCLUDED: As a bonus, a 50-foot teaching 1" line and ratchet is used to attach the person above, so they can reach up if needed while learning to balance and walking the line. For ages 5+; max. weight 400 lbs.
product_description: Slacklining has become a popular trend and recognized sport for kids 6Y+, as well as for adults, over the last 10 years. The kit contains a 50-foot 2" slackline with a heavy duty metal ratchet, a ratchet cover, a 50" teaching line with a ratchet, and a storage bag.

name: Cypher Slackline Trickster Kit, 2 Inch Wide Webbing, 49ft / 15m Length with Ergonomic Retchet, Tree Protection and Padded Ratchet Covers
short_description: VERSATILE LENGTHS: Available in either 49ft / 15m or 82ft / 25m options, perfect for both beginners starting with shorter setups and advanced users seeking longer lines for tricks.
COMPLETE KIT: Includes 2-inch wide slackline webbing, sturdy ratchet system, protective neoprene ratchet pad, and two tree protection wraps for safe setup.
BEGINNER FRIENDLY: Start low and short to master basic balance, then progress to longer setups as your skills improve.
OUTDOOR ACTIVITY: Perfect for backyard fun, park adventures, or urban settings with proper anchors, offering a unique blend of balance training and entertainment.
STRENGTH BUILDING: Combines core workout, balance training, and recreational fun in one exciting challenge, suitable for all skill levels.
SAFETY & QUALITY: This kit meets the stringent German TUV tested safety and quality standards.
product_description: Experience the thrill of slacklining with the CYPHER Trickster Kit! Available in either 49ft / 15m or 82ft / 25m this 2-inch wide slackline setup provides everything you need to start your balancing journey. The kit includes a sturdy slackline webbing, reliable ratchet with neoprene padding, and tree protection wraps for safe anchoring. Perfect for beginners and advanced users alike, slacklining offers a unique blend of balance training, core strengthening, and pure entertainment. Start low and short as you develop your skills, then progress to longer lines and impressive tricks. Whether you're setting up in your backyard or at your local park, this versatile kit transforms any space with suitable anchors into your personal balance training ground. The 2-inch webbing width offers stable footing as you practice walking, balancing, and performing tricks. Challenge yourself, improve your focus, and discover a new way to stay active with this complete slackline kit. And don’t worry—this slackline meets the tough German TUV safety standards, so you can slackline with confidence! Slacklining is all about balance and fun. You walk or balance on a line stretched between two trees, mixing yoga, strength, focus and tricks into one exciting challenge. Start with shorter, lower lines to get the hang of it, then move on to longer setups and show off some cool tricks! It's not just a great outdoor activity; it also helps you build core strength and improve your balance. You can set it up in your backyard, at the park, or urban areas with solid anchors. What’s included in the box: 2" slackline webbing, slackline ratchet, neoprene ratchet pad, and two tree protection wraps. Let the fun begin!

name: Barefoot Slackline Kit 60ft (18m) Complete Set Including, Ratchet, Training Line, Bark Protectors & Instructions! Designed for Both Kids & Adults - 3 Colors Available (Neon Green)
short_description: Perfect length for adults & kids - Make your slackline short or long with the variable length line. Kids should start with 25-30ft to minimize line bounce that can be hard to control. Find a wider spot and expand as you get better and want to try new tricks.
User friendly - A high-grade, grippy, wide line that is easy to get started on. Ergonomic handles on the ratchets make them simple & safe to use. Setup guide included.
Tree friendly- This is a slackline kit with tree protectors, the included bark protectors wrap around tree trunks to keep the slack line from rubbing the bark away.
Healthy exercise - Slacklining improves your balance and core strength. Plus, slacklines are so much fun you won't even notice you're doing a full core workout

Safety first - Use the included safety line, rigged at head height, to learn with. Our ratchets are brightly colored to help you stay safe - when setting up, only touch these colored parts to ensure your fingers stay clear of the tightening mechanism.

👣 Contents - 1x 18m Barefoot Slackline with loop, 1x Ratchet and Loop, 1x Training Line with small ratchet, 2x Tree Protectors, 1x Drawstring Travel Bag, 1x "How to Slackline" booklet & 1x Quick Setup Card! 👣
